description: Access and cache transactional data
list every appearance of an address anywhere on the chain

list and/or share named addresses
list and/or share abi signatures

export block-related data
export transaction-related data

return a date given a block number or a block number given a date

export parts of the state for given address(es)
export data related to ERC20 and/or ERC721 token(s)
Control the scraper and build the index
query the status of the system
serve the TrueBlocks API via the flame server
scrape the chain and build an index of address appearances (aka digests)

query the status of the pinning system

return prices collected from configured remote API
